markdownRemark.html:
If you have been looking for a quick way to open up specs in P4V, the Go To Spec modal is likely the thing you need. You can navigate to this modal by clicking on Search | Go Toâ€¦ or by hitting the CTRL + G shortcut.

This is what I use when I need to quickly lookup a changelist number but it supports searching for the following specs as well:

  • Branch Mapping
  • Label
  • Workspace
  • User
  • Job

frontmatter.description: P4V Tips: How to quickly open up a spec P4V.
frontmatter.title: How to quickly open up a spec in P4V
